"target" "custom potion" <Quotes are important.>
Use "me" as target to use on yourself.
[0  args][Random potion on yourself][1  args][Random potion on target]
[2  args][custom potion on target]  [3+ args][Random error message]
Special targets:
<help Help description>      <memes ??? Use at own risk>
<credits Credits and thanks> <stats Tag stats>```
**Which page would you like to view?** (+t
tried to mix potassium and water
should stop breaking his own tag
became a small blue fairy with silence issues

Tag made by Pumper with lots of help from pankek, Lonestar*, and others

Also this idea was inspired by pankek's pkmn tag So give them a lot of love! They've been a huge help

Here's what I know so far!:
  **PET** - I pet the recipient - ``[Recipient]`` or ``me``
  **HUG** - I hug the recipient - ``[Recipient]`` or ``me``
  **CUTE** - I call the recipient cute - ``[Recipient]`` or ``me``
  **BOOP** - I boop the recipient - ``[Recipient]`` or ``me``
  **GOODNIGHT** - I say goodnight to the recipient - ``[Recipient]`` or ``me`` or ``pump``
  **CONVO** - I come up with a conversation topic - ``no args needed``
  **SHIP** - Cheap replacement for the ship tag - ``[Ship name]`` or ``[Person 1] [Person 2]``
  **GOODBYE** - Kinda like Goodnight, but with Goodbye instead - ``[Recipient]`` or ``me``
  **COOK** - I can try and cook for you - ``[Food]``
  **ANIMAL** - See what animal \x7e~RNG~~ RoboPump thinks you are - ``[Recipient]`` or ``me``
Or you can just say hi with ``+t
Well, all you had to do was ask! *gladly pets
in awe of their awesomeness and cuteness*
Actually, I was on my way to do that now! *pets
* You look like you want some pets too... AW, COME HERE! *pets
* don't think i forgot you too! *pets
Why didn't you just say so! *pets
Well, all you had to do was ask! *gladly pets
in awe of their awesomeness and cuteness*
*Gasp* Me? Really! Of course I will! *eagerly hugs
I've been waiting for you to ask! *hugs
Sure... I suppose I could... Ah who am I kidding! Of course imma hug you! *hugs
I'll need to see your hugging license... Alright, fine. I'll do it anyway, but only cause you're super cute. *hugs
*! Hey... You want in, don't you? I can tell... Well come on! *brings
in a big happy group hug*!
In what universe would I turn down such an offer!? *hugs
gleefully* ...By the way, the answer is "in none of them"
I'll hug you if you hug me. Deal? Deal. *hugs
* oh, and the mediator of the hug is right here. *brings
*Gasp* Me? Really! Of course I will! *eagerly hugs
I've been waiting for you to ask! *hugs

I'll need to see your hugging license... Alright, fine. I'll do it anyway, but only cause you're super cute. *hugs
You have no idea how cute you really are
On a scale of 1 to 10, you are SO CUTE I WANNA DIE!
Man, I tell you. You are really really cute. Like. SUPER cute.
Youre so cute! Can I hug you?
! You're really really cute! Don't let anyone tell you otherwise!
MY HEART IS MELTING FROM YOUR CUTENESS,
!!! I could just eat you up! ...I promise I won't, though...
, you're cute in every single universe and timeline. It's a multiversal CONSTANT!
You have no idea how cute you really are
On a scale of 1 to 10, you are SO CUTE I WANNA DIE!
Man, I tell you. You are really really cute. Like. SUPER cute.
Youre so cute! Can I hug you?
Such a cute nose. How could I resist? *boops
If you wouldn't have asked, I would have anyway. *boops
It would be an honor to,
Such a cute nose. How could I resist? *boops
If you wouldn't have asked, I would have anyway. *boops
Goodnight! *turns out the light and closes the door gently*
NOOOO!! *runs from sleep but falls asleep midrun*
Goodnight! *turns out the light and closes the door gently*
Goodnight! *turns out the light and closes the door gently*

Idk how to cook ``<arg2:Missing Arg>``, sorry!
Sure thing! *Gives you nothing* ...Tell me what I need to cook next time.
I'm leaving this one out of the help page on purpose
*Blush* O-Oh... I'm sorry. I have to get to know you better for that...
I'm not designed for such things. Forgive me.
Get your mind out of the gutter!
Woah now, don't get too excited. I can't do that.
Sorry, I can't do that. You should've known.
Pump, you know you're a cat already...
What's that? IDK how to do that... But you can use ``+t
help`` to see what I *can* do!

----   __Dice command by Oshisaure__   ----

Basically a roll command, but it looks cooler cause you have actual dice.

Usage: `+t dice [type]`, where type is 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20 or 100.
Will roll one of those:
http://imgur.com/PAtRJQH
Note that the 100-die gives a result from 0 to 99, not from 1 to 100. Same goes with the 10-die.

You can get all the pictures using `+t dice list`. Feel free to use them for whatever.
-die. Run the tag without args for help.
those two counditions are enough to check if the type is one of the allowed ones and not like D69 or D4||8
subrtact 1 to type for random since random's range is 0-n
when it's 10(0) do nothing since its range is actually 0-9(9)
else add 1 to the result to push it back to the 1-n range
have to slice the result in 2 cause surprise a D100 is actually two D10
AAAAAAAAND embed a zero else it bugs out when you roll a low score
-die. Run the tag without args for help.
close oneline, arg == list, and no arg
